message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $110 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $105. What do you think?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $108. What do you think?
